hotels.name: Royal Court Hotel Ramallah
hotels.description: This hotel is located in a central location in the heart of Ramallah, a 10-minute walk from the Khalil Sakakini Cultural Center. All spacious rooms and suites feature a balcony and a flat-screen TV. All rooms at Royal Court Hotel include a private bathroom with bathrobes and free toiletries. A free breakfast buffet is available to guests in the restaurant, which also serves à la carte meals. It also offers room service upon request. Royal Court offers a range of facilities from its 24-hour front desk, including booking information for tours, airport shuttles, and car rentals. Free parking is also available.
